Summary: apppeared in stright line white trail then yellow-orange then red and solid dark and dissappeared moving fast
divs: Sighting DetailsI had my 8" dob out star gazing and a white light appeared i turned my scope on it and it was dark object emmiting white trail then changed to yellow-orange i thaought it was a plane until it turned red and took off fast i mean gone and dissappeared.it was traveling NE for duration of 5-8 secs in a straight line i could tell it was a craft that i was looking at from behind there is ac international nearby and i have tracked and seen planes in my scope before and it definitley was not a plane at least not your typical planes. i thoght it my be this aurora plane i hear news about it had a small rounded triangle kinda shape it was movin. it kinda left me very puzzled cause i have seen planes before nothing like this one.
